name: Example - create new project checklist
description: A checklist for creating new projects

checks.name: Check the project ID
checks.guide: The new project ID must be unique and compliant with relevant conventions.

checks.name: Project added to DB
checks.description: Add a new project schema to teh database.

checks.name: Create project workspace
checks.description: Create a new Geoserver workspace for this project.

checks.name: Add a new vector datastore
checks.description: Add the projects schema as a vector datastore in Geoserver.
checks.guide: Within Geoserver under Stores >> Vector Data Sources >> PostGIS and add the datastore to the project workspace. Ensure that the schema value is set correctly.
